input: NOT 100% REAL HUMAN HAIR!! I tried to bleach them because they aren't anywhere close to platinum or bleach blonde and they didn't lift at all and you can see all the strands that aren't blonde at all really sucks! 100% false advertisement!
tried it for cosmetic procedures in a day spa; didn't really work.
I couldn't leave it in long enough to work bc it burned my gums, and the trays were hard to get to mold.
My girls wear these one time before the ends split and the plastic headband pokes out.
